Object.Name: Notecard
Object.Description:
Two big changes in the latest update:
First, the Rhino scenario is now fully scripted. Check out the new automation when the villain stage is advanced. I'll get all of the scenarios scripted eventually.

Also, I've added a scripting zone above each play mat for minions. Move a minion into this area, and a health counter (and Tough card, if necessary) will be automatically placed.
